#include <cstdio>

int A[] = {0, 1, 4, 3, 8, 5, 2, 7, 6, 9};

int sumOfDigits(int p)
{
        int r = 0;
        while (p != 0) {
                r += A[p % 10];
                p /= 10;
        }
        return r % 10;
}

int sumOfRange(int x, int y)
{
        if (x > y) {
                return 0;
        }
        int r = 0;
        for (; x <= y; ++x) {
                r += sumOfDigits(x);
        }
        return r;
}

int main()
{
        int t = 0;
        int a = 0;
        int b = 0;
        int sum = 0;
        scanf("%d", &t);
        for (int i = 0; i < t; ++i) {
                sum = 0;
                scanf("%d%d", &a, &b);
                sum += (b / 10 - a / 10) * 45;
                sum += sumOfRange((b / 10) * 10, b);
                sum += sumOfDigits(a);
                sum -= sumOfRange(a / 10 * 10, a);
                printf("%d\n", sum);
        }
        return 0;
}
